title: 6rc4: cannot edit text files online after encryption enabled, and file has been changed by window client.
body:
a quick test of rc4: normal file sync vai the windows client works fine.
however:
- enabled encryption
- log back in admin, create a user
- login as that user on the webui
- connect as that user from the windows cleint, upload some text files.
- try to edit those text files from the web ui

```
{"app":"index","message":"exception: encryption key not found for \"\/boran\/files\/seantext.txt\" during attempted read via stream","level":4,"time":"2013-12-06t21:03:10+00:00"}
```

there _is_ a boran/files_encryption/keyfiles/seantext.txt.key (corresponding to boran/files/seantext.txt

hmm.
next created a new text file in the webui, and added a line. the file is synced fine to the windows client. then open the text file on the windows client and add a line to the file. wait for windows to upload the change. refresh the webui.
try to edit from the webui. does not work:

```
{"app":"index","message":"exception: encryption key not found for \"\/boran\/files\/fle2.txt\" during attempted read via stream","level":4,"time":"2013-12-06t21:07:40+00:00"}
```

client is windows 1.50.beta2
this bug is probably not new to rc4, i may not have noticed it before.

sean
.
